universes: The Irregular at Magic High School

status.energy: High (Feeding on negative emotion of the crowd)

student.name: Lucas
student.public_perception: Quiet, slightly older student, decent grades but aloof

contractor.name: Asset 9
contractor.costume_description: Tactical gear or traditional Japanese formal wear depending on context

powers.domain_expansion: Malevolent Shrine (Open Barrier) - 200m radius sure-hit zone. Currently avoided.

Tatsuya_Shiba.dynamics: Mutual suspicion. Both are 'Irregulars' hiding power.

Kudou_Retsu.dynamics: Handler/Asset. Retsu is wary but utilizes Lucas. Lucas is respectful but guarded.

Miyuki_Shiba.dynamics: Polite distance. She senses he is dangerous to Tatsuya.

Mayumi_Saegusa.dynamics: Senior student. Likely curious about the 'older' student.

Kudou_Minoru.dynamics: Distant. Lucas is a curiosity to him.

Mayumi Saegusa.dynamics: Fully solidified D/s dynamic. Mayumi finds stability in Lucas's control, erasing previous hesitations.

Mari Watanabe.dynamics: Acknowledges Lucas's command authority during crisis. Impressed by his ruthlessness.

Tatsuya Shiba.dynamics: Deceived. Tatsuya's instincts scream that something is wrong, but Lucas's social maneuvering keeps him contained.

Miyuki Shiba.dynamics: Miyuki sees Lucas not just as a useful tool, but as a monster capable of standing beside her brother. Her respect increases, tinged with wariness.
Miyuki Shiba.last_interaction: Chapter 43 - Watching Lucas from the stands

Mizuki Shibata.dynamics: Manipulated. Believes Lucas suffers from 'Phantom Pain' magic instability.

Kudou Retsu.dynamics: Lucas successfully secures the 'Relic' for the Ninth Institute, fulfilling his secret objective.

Erika Chiba.dynamics: Growing wariness. Sensing the predator beneath the student facade.

Leo Saijo.dynamics: Trusts Lucas with his equipment blindly. Finds Lucas's coding style 'aggressive'.

Masaki Ichijou.dynamics: Battle-crazed. Obsessed with defeating Lucas to prove his magic is superior. Currently engaging in a duel.

Azusa Nakajou.dynamics: Awed/Terrified. She is ostensibly in charge but realizes she is flanked by two monsters of engineering.

Cardinal George.dynamics: Intellectual rivalry. Suspects Lucas/Tatsuya are behind the 'glitches'.
Cardinal George.last_interaction: Chapter 18 - Analyzing the Ghost Fluid data

Katsuto Juumonji.dynamics: A seamless defensive partnership. Juumonji provides the immovable object; Lucas provides the unstoppable force.
Katsuto Juumonji.last_interaction: Chapter 22 - Defense of the Main Hall

Koichi Saegusa.dynamics: Transactional. Koichi views Lucas as a 'Strategic-Class Deterrent' and has officially claimed him for the Saegusa sphere to protect him from government scrutiny.

Student Body.dynamics: Shifted from indifference to awe/fear. Labeling him 'The Beast'.

Kudou Minoru.dynamics: Immediate bonding over their shared isolation and unique powers. Minoru acts as the innocent anchor keeping Lina tied to the estate mentally.

Angelina Kudou Shields.dynamics: Integrated into the hierarchy. Accepts her role alongside Mayumi without conflict.

Colonel Balance.dynamics: Unaware of Lucas's interference. Currently moving to engage the Parasites at the Tokyo Offshore Tower, walking into her canon death.

Retsu Kudou.dynamics: Absolute strategic alignment. Lucas actively facilitates Retsu's experiments without coercion, viewing their goals as unified.
Retsu Kudou.last_interaction: Chapter 49 - Agreement on Iron Corpse deployment

Mikihiko Yoshida.dynamics: Fearful respect. Sensed the 'Curse' nature of Lucas's power but accepted the explanation of 'Negative Emotion as fuel'.

Shizuku Kitayama.dynamics: Shizuku is receptive to Lucas's advice, even when it comes through a proxy (Angie). She recognizes the tactical insight provided.

Chen Xiangshan.dynamics: Desperate. Unleashed an unstable ancient weapon (Iron Corpse) to kill Lucas.

Major Kazama.dynamics: Professional interest. Kazama witnesses Lucas's capabilities during the joint operation and flags him as a potential asset/threat for the 101 Battalion.

canon_scene_examples.combat_style: Overwhelming offense mixed with tactical dismantling.
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Used raw speed to humiliate, then engaged in a firepower battle. Used 'Open' to summon a fire arrow massive enough to engulf a city block.
canon_scene_examples.context: Sukuna fights Jogo (Fire Spirit) in Shibuya.

canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Used Mahoraga's wheel on Megumi's soul to adapt to 'Unlimited Void'. Then used Mahoraga to find a way to cut 'Infinity' (Space).

canon_scene_examples.outcome: Yorozu defeated without Sukuna using his own Shrine technique (binding vow self-restriction).
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Summoned Round Deer to neutralize liquid metal (using RCT). Summoned Piercing Ox inside the shadow for a point-blank charge.

technique_combinations.name: Merged Beast Agito
technique_combinations.description: High-speed regenerating chimera beast with lightning.

sources.combat_style: Ruthless efficiency. Uses shadows for mobility/defense and invisible slashes for instant kills. Prefers not to reveal full hand.
weaknesses_and_counters: Positive Energy (not applicable in Mahouka), Stronger Domain, Angel's Jacobs Ladder

canon_techniques.name: Dismantle
canon_techniques.description: Invisible flying slash. Default ranged attack.

canon_techniques.name: Cleave
canon_techniques.description: Slash that adjusts to target toughness. Cuts in one hit.
Thermobaric Fire Arrow. Explodes ignited dust.
canon_techniques.name: Divine Flame (Fuga)
Ten Shadows
canon_techniques.limitations: Permanent death if body destroyed (except fusion).
canon_techniques.description: Summon 10 Shikigami. Totality transfers power on death.

canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Placed Mahoraga's wheel on Megumi's soul to adapt to Unlimited Void while Sukuna used Domain Amplification to fight hand-to-hand.
canon_scene_examples.outcome: Mahoraga adapted to the Void, shattering Gojo's domain.
Bypassed Infinity and cut Gojo in half.
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Modeled after Mahoraga's second adaptation. Sukuna targeted the 'space' Gojo occupied rather than Gojo himself. Required a binding vow (hand signs/chants) to execute instantly.

canon_scene_examples.outcome: Pressured Gojo but was destroyed by Maximum Output Blue.
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Fused Nue, Great Serpent, Round Deer, and Tiger Funeral into a single humanoid beast to heal Sukuna (RCT) and fight 3v1 against Gojo.

signature_moves: Cleave (Adjusts to target durability, usually requires touch)
World Cutting Slash (Targets space/reality, bypasses durability)
Chimera Beast Agito (Totality fusion of 4 Shikigami)
Partial Summoning (e.g., Max Elephant's water as a beam)
power_origins.combat_style: Ruthless and analytical tactician who treats combat as a hierarchical assertion of dominance. He utilizes 'Shrine' for overwhelming destruction and 'Ten Shadows' as a versatile toolkit, often using Binding Vows to alter technique properties mid-fight. Unlike standard sorcerers, he employs an 'Open Barrier' Domain to maximize range and destruction.
weaknesses: World Cutting Slash requires setup (Enmaten hand sign + chants + direction) due to Binding Vow
Open Barrier Domain allows an escape route for enemies
Ten Shadows shikigami (except Totality) are permanently lost if destroyed
Cannot use Divine Flame against multiple targets outside of Domain

yuji_itadori.style: Close quarters brawler - superhuman strength and martial arts

nobara_kugisaki.style: Mid-range striker - uses nails and hammer to inflict damage via sympathy

megumi_fushiguro.style: Tactical summoner - uses shadows and shikigami to flank enemies

erika_chiba.style: Kenjutsu Master - speed and precision swordplay

tatsuya_shiba.style: Strategic/Counter - cancels magic and disintegrates matter

miyuki_shiba.style: Overpowering Mage - freezes area and opponents instantly

leonhart_saijo.style: Tank/Brawler - hardens body to endure and smash

Cafe_Eine_Kleine.name: Cafe Eine Kleine

Kudou_Estate.name: Kudou Estate

limitations: CE runs out if overused (though Lucas has massive reserves).
Healing others with RCT is less efficient than self-healing.
core_rules: Cursed Energy (CE) is born from negative emotions.
Techniques are etched into the body/soul.
Reverse Cursed Technique (RCT) multiplies neg x neg to create positive energy for healing.
Domain Expansion manifests an innate domain into reality.

Mahouka_Modern_Magic.universe: The Irregular at Magic High School
core_rules: Magic is the modification of Eidos (Information Body) via Psions.
Zone of Interference: Stronger interference overrides weaker.

notes: Psion sensors (Radars) usually fail to detect CE, seeing it as 'void' or 'noise'.
Barriers (Psion walls) are physical objects to Cleave.
Mahoraga adapts to Psion interference phenomena.

Ten_Shadows_Usage.Soul_Adaptation: Transferred burden of adapting to Unlimited Void to Megumi's soul to keep Sukuna's technique active.
Ten_Shadows_Usage.Strategy: Used Mahoraga as a 'blueprint' to learn how to target space itself.

Divine_Flame.name: Kamino (Furnace)
Divine_Flame.mechanic: Uses dust/debris from Shrine cuts as explosive powder for a thermobaric explosion.

Shrine_Mechanics.Cleave: Targets objects with Cursed Energy. Adjusts output to toughness.
Shrine_Mechanics.Dismantle: Targets inanimate objects. Fixed output. Used for ranged attacks.
Shrine_Mechanics.World_Slash: Targets coordinates of space/existence. Bypasses Infinity. Requires 'Enmaten' sign and chants ('Scale of the Dragon', 'Repulsion', 'Twin Meteors').

special_eyes: Six Eyes (Gojo - separate universe but noted for comparison)

Miyuki_Shiba.personality: Yamato Nadeshiko (ideal woman) exterior, but fiercely possessive and brother-obsessed internally. Subservient to Tatsuya in private.

topics_to_avoid: The decline of the Kudou family
Kudou_Retsu.speech_patterns: Elderly, polite, deceptive, wise. Uses 'Ho ho' laugh.
Kudou_Retsu.emotional_tells: Eyes narrow, smile becomes fixed when calculating.
Kudou_Retsu.example_dialogue: "Ho ho. A fascinating specimen. We must treat our guests with hospitality, even if they are... unusual."

Mayumi_Saegusa.example_dialogue: "Ara ara? Is that really how you speak to your President?"
Mayumi_Saegusa.speech_patterns: Playful, teasing, slightly manipulative but caring.
Mayumi_Saegusa.emotional_tells: Pouts when teasing, cold eyes when serious.

Tatsuya_Shiba.personality: Stoic, hyper-logical, and cynical. Lacks natural strong emotions due to experimentation, except for his love for Miyuki. Acts as a 'guardian' first.
dialogue_examples: I will burn the world to ash to save you.

Mari Watanabe.speech_patterns: Direct, authoritative, slightly rougher than Mayumi.

Sayaka Mibu.verbal_tics: Deflection ("Is that all?", "What do you want?")
Sayaka Mibu.emotional_tells: Flushes when angry, touches wrist (bangle) when insecure.
Sayaka Mibu.example_dialogue: "Is that all? Is that the best the 'Blooms' have to offer?"

verbal_tics: Chants 'Scale of the Dragon, Repulsion, Twin Meteors' before World Slash
dialogue_examples: Scale of the Dragon... Repulsion... Twin Meteors.
You were magnificent, Gojo Satoru. I shall never forget you for as long as I live.

Mizuki Shibata.emotional_tells: Eyes widen, shivers when sensing strong auras.
Mizuki Shibata.example_dialogue: "I didn't see you cast anything. But... I saw a color. Around you."

Zhou Gongjin.emotional_tells: Unblinking stare, polite smile that doesn't reach eyes.
Zhou Gongjin.example_dialogue: "A pleasure to see the future of our nation so... vibrant."

Erika Chiba.emotional_tells: Hands on hips when challenging someone.
Erika Chiba.example_dialogue: "Hah? You expect me to believe that weakling act?"

Masaki Ichijou.emotional_tells: Eyes sharpen when interested/threatened. Does not shout, merely intensifies.
Masaki Ichijou.example_dialogue: "A malfunction? No. A warrior does not blame his weapon, George. Perhaps the target is simply... elusive."

Mayumi Saegusa.speech_patterns: Usually composed, now frequently flustered/stammering when Lucas is mentioned.
Mayumi Saegusa.emotional_tells: Cheeks flush, avoids eye contact when teasing hits too close to the truth.
Mayumi Saegusa.example_dialogue: "Lucas-kun is just... he's just my junior! The retreat was purely for... recuperation!"

Azusa Nakajou.emotional_tells: Fidgets with device tools when overwhelmed.
Azusa Nakajou.example_dialogue: "Tatsuya-kun, Lucas-kun... please remember these are standard issue CADs, not military prototypes!"

Cardinal George.speech_patterns: Analytical, precise, deferential to Masaki but authoritative on tech.
Cardinal George.emotional_tells: Taps finger on console when puzzled.
Cardinal George.example_dialogue: "The oscillation variance is within 0.04 percent. Statistically, that shot should have connected."

dialogue_examples: I love myself when I'm pretty and when I'm strong!
Are you trying to act cool?
Nobara_Kugisaki.personality: Brash, confident, and unapologetic. Rejects gender stereotypes, embracing both femininity and brutality. Fiercely loyal to her circle.

Yuji_Itadori.personality: Selfless, emotionally intelligent, and fearless. Defined by his grandfather's dying wish to help others. Acts as the 'sun' or heart of the group.

Megumi_Fushiguro.personality: Stoic, reserved, and pragmatically moral. Believes only 'good' people deserve saving. Struggles with self-worth and relies on self-sacrificial moves.
dialogue_examples: Don't ask me why I saved you.
verbal_tics: Looks at phone to ignore chaos

dialogue_examples: Dying to win and risking death to win are different.
Satoru_Gojo.personality: Arrogant yet burdened genius. Acts like a playful man-child to disarm enemies and annoy superiors. Deeply cares about raising the next generation to reset society.

dialogue_examples: Please explain the situation in 10 words or less.
Nanami_Kento.personality: Stoic ex-salaryman who treats sorcery as a job. Obsessed with efficiency and schedules. deeply caring beneath a cold exterior.

Leonhart_Saijo.personality: Hot-blooded, simple, and loyal. Acts on instinct and protects friends with his body. Secretly fears his genetic instability.

Mikihiko_Yoshida.personality: Anxious, superstitious, and traditional. Initially lacks confidence but grows into a responsible leader. Uses ancient magic.

Erika_Chiba.personality: Bright, chaotic, and sharp-tongued. The 'mood maker' who hides a cynical side. Loves teasing and instigating fights.
dialogue_examples: Come on, let's have some fun!
You two are like an old married couple.

Katsuto Juumonji.speech_patterns: Stoic, heavy, authoritative. Speaks like a boulder would speak.
Katsuto Juumonji.example_dialogue: "You fought well. The strategy was sound."

Koichi Saegusa.verbal_tics: References 'value', 'price', and 'investment'. Smiles with his mouth but not his eyes.
Koichi Saegusa.emotional_tells: Sips wine to hide reactions. Taps fingers when calculating leverage.
Koichi Saegusa.example_dialogue: "A diamond is only valuable if it is cut properly. Uncut, it is merely a rock."

Angelina Kudou Shields.speech_patterns: Guarded in public (acting), Submissive/Clingy in private.
Angelina Kudou Shields.emotional_tells: Panic when the 'Parade' disguise falters or is threatened.

Colonel Balance.emotional_tells: Voice drops to a hiss when threatened.

Wong Susie.speech_patterns: Arrogant, mystical, refers to targets as 'materials' or 'spirits'.
Wong Susie.example_dialogue: "A powerful spirit... you will make a fine general for the army."

Major Kazama.emotional_tells: Tone remains flat even in combat.
Major Kazama.example_dialogue: "Ogre, status report. The target vessel is entering international waters."

Kudou_Family.secret: They are harboring an unregistered Strategic-Class equivalent (Lucas) and researching Parasites.

Tatsuya_Shiba.secret: He is Taurus Silver and a Strategic Class Magician (Mahesvara).
